title: Building the National Garden of American Heroes

enrichment.summary: This executive order directs the creation of a National Garden of American Heroes, a statuary park honoring a wide range of historically significant Americans who embody the spirit and achievements of the nation. It establishes responsibilities for funding, site selection, and annual public reporting on progress to ensure the garden is built and maintained as a symbol of patriotism and national pride.
potential_concerns: The selection of individuals to be honored could be controversial due to differing public opinions on historical legacies.
Funding and resource allocation may conflict with other federal priorities or be insufficient to complete the project.
Site selection and construction might face environmental, legal, or community opposition.
The order may be criticized for promoting a particular political or ideological perspective on history.
Maintaining and updating the garden over time could require ongoing federal oversight and resources that are not guaranteed.
